channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- ActiveCampaign
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- ActiveCampaign

item.title: CVE-2021-24133|2024-08-03T19:21:18.611Z -- unknown -- activecampaign
item.description: Lack of CSRF checks in the ActiveCampaign WordPress plugin, versions before 8.0.2, on its Settings form, which could allow attacker to make a logged-in administrator change API Credentials to attacker's account.
